Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterEvent("ADDON_LOADED"); self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_LOOT"); self:RegisterEvent("LOOT_OPENED") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_ENTERING_WORLD"); self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_COMBAT_XP_GAIN") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_COMBAT_HONOR_GAIN") self:RegisterEvent("COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_CURRENCY") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_MONEY") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_SKILL") self:RegisterEvent("UNIT_SPELLCAST_SENT") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_COMBAT_FACTION_CHANGE") self:RegisterEvent("CHAT_MSG_OPENING") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_LOGOUT") self:RegisterEvent("UPDATE_INSTANCE_INFO") self:RegisterEvent("AUCTION_ITEM_LIST_UPDATE") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_REGEN_DISABLED") self:RegisterEvent("UI_ERROR_MESSAGE") self:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_DEAD")

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.tooltipText ~= nil then GameTooltip_AddNewbieTip(self, self.tooltipText, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, self.newbieText) end
Scripts.OnLeave: if self.tooltipText ~= nil then GameTooltip:Hide() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetBackdropColor (0, 0, 0, 0.9) self:SetBackdropBorderColor(0, 0, 0, 1) self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton") self:SetUserPlaced(true) tinsert(UISpecialFrames, self:GetName())
